about_the_game:
Descend into Darkness in Valthazar's Sanctum

Valthazar, the fallen deity, languishes in his forsaken sanctum, a forgotten underground dungeon hidden from mortal eyes for eons. Now, your destiny calls – you've been hired to retrieve a relic of unimaginable power, but the path ahead is treacherous, and Valthazar's dark influence lingers.

Valthazar's Sanctum is an immersive FPS Roguelite experience that will test your skills, wits, and courage.

Key Features:
  • Unleash Your Arsenal in Procedurally Generated Levels

    Each descent into the depths is a unique journey. Procedurally generated levels ensure no two runs are the same. Prepare for surprises around every corner, as you confront legions of menacing foes.

  • Unlock Your True Potential

    Surviving the horrors of Valthazar's Sanctum grants you the means to unlock your true potential. Accumulate resources during your perilous journeys, then invest them wisely to enhance your arsenal and abilities.

  • Navigate Deadly Traps and Unlock Forbidden Secrets

    Valthazar's Sanctum is rife with peril. Deadly traps, cunning puzzles, and locked doors bar your way.

Prepare to descend into the abyss, embrace the darkness, and confront the malevolent god himself. Will you emerge as a hero or succumb to the depths of madness? Your journey begins now in Valthazar's Sanctum.

  • OS: Windows 10 or Later 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 265
